attributes.action: keep to his statement, when he was non-elected to prime minister to listen to what the general public and politicians are asking is to hold a referendum , before he puts his signature to paper on the forthcoming signing of the E.U treaty.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Politicians are suppose to be working on behalf on the general public, and i feel many want to have a say on the up and coming E.U treaty that Mr Blair agreed to , saying it was in the best interest for this country.If that is the case, Mr Brown stick by your speach and let the people of this country have a say. What have you got to hide?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
